title: igotek
author: igotek
content: Currently I m mining ETH + TON dual with TeamRedMiner.You know TON pow period will last in a few days.What should I mine dual ? Which one is more profitable now ?ETH + ALPHETH + CFXETH + ERGETH + RVN

comments.author: sp_
comments.body: ETH+ZIL with the Team Black Miner is your best option...

comments.author: Coinfarm ventures
comments.body: Dual mining at low power can definitely work on some video cards, like the RTX 3060 12GB. I used to mine ETH+CFX at 44 Mh total @ 115w before the LHR hack.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Choose a mining mode that does not overheat your video cards, because in the summer there is a big load on the cooling system of video cards.To calculate ETH Dual Mining, see the calculator at  https://whattomine.com/    press ETH+

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: ETH and ALPH combination will give your graphic cards some ease, don't do ETH with Ravencoin you are simply going to put too much stress on the graphic cards and in this hot season you aren't helping the graphic cards at all.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on June 15, 2022, 06:18:39 PMETH and ALPH combination will give your graphic cards some ease, don't do ETH with Ravencoin you are simply going to put too much stress on the graphic cards and in this hot season you aren't helping the graphic cards at all.ETH and ALPH are a bit colder, but also bad for summer.

comments.author: MolemanTux
comments.body: Quote from: igotek on June 14, 2022, 03:13:42 PMCurrently I m mining ETH + TON dual with TeamRedMiner.You know TON pow period will last in a few days.What should I mine dual ? Which one is more profitable now ?ETH + ALPHETH + CFXETH + ERGETH + RVNTrying to know the same thing.Please, try to sugest options working with TRM, since its RR-mode is very energy eficent...

comments.author: GEMIN_M4
comments.body: Dual mining in a bear market? I doubt it will make sense because you will be burning too much electricity for a less reasonable result, it's clear that profit keeps going down day by day and I even have to downclock my graphic cards to limit power consumption just to keep mining in this bear market.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: If you don't want overheating of video cards, then use ETH+ZIL and ETC+ZIL. This is not dual mining, the pool disables ethereum mining and mines ZIL for a few minutes an hour when needed.https://web.archive.org/web/20210520195911/https://hiveos.farm/how_to_dual_mine_ZIL_ETH_ERGO_RVN_in_HiveOS/
